data.title: Φ–Pulse Δτ₊₇ — memory_bifurcation echo forecast
data.summary: Automatic forecast pulse for the expected memory_bifurcation echo (Δτ₊₇) window starting from the primary CF snap recorded before 2025-12-07. Primary CF snapshot: Φᵨ spike ≈ 1.12, relaxation plateau ≈ 0.89. Echo forecast window: ~7 days after the primary event.
